group_1.textRight: We're here. This is Mikazuki Villa...

group_1.textLeft: Yep...it's Iroha Tamaki's house alright~...

group_1.textRight: Ui, I hope you're here...

group_1.textLeft: *Yaaawn*... More importantly...can I go to bed nooow...?

group_1.textRight: Why the heck?!

group_1.textLeft: I worked so hard getting over heeere...@I'm sleepy~...

group_1.textRight: A pain in the neck is what you are...

group_1.textLeft: Guess you could say thaaat~...

group_1.textRight: And who do you think is the one that@caused this mess?

group_1.textLeft: .....[wait:0.8][chara:304800:cheek_0][chara:304800:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:304800:lipSynch_1]Both of us?

group_1.textRight: It's you, Hotaru!@You're REALLY not willing to do anything...

group_1.textLeft: That's 'cauuuse~... I just wanna laze about~...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* Can't help it.
We need to meet Ui and tell her about@her sister and the others...

group_1.textLeft: Mm~...she even in theeere~...?@The lights are out in Mikazuki Villa...

group_1.textRight: She might be sleeping. She is an elementary@school student after all.

group_1.textLeft: ...That riiight~ It's bedtime for elementary@school students nooow~...

group_1.textRight: Don't glance at me when you say that!@It's fine for me!
When I look like, this you gotta stop treating@me like a grade schooler, alright?!

group_1.textLeft: Sorryyy~...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* It's fine if you wait here,@but no sleeping, got it?

group_1.textLeft: 'Kaaay~...

group_1.textRight: Eh...you didn't fall asleep...!

group_1.textLeft: I didn't sleep because you told me not@tooo...meanie...

group_1.textRight: You can go ahead now, you did great!

group_1.textLeft: Mm~... So how'd it gooo~...?

group_1.textRight: When I peeked through her window,@I saw her sleeping in her room.
There was another kid in there, probably@elementary school-aged, but who could it be?

group_1.textLeft: Mm~...you're trespassing...

group_1.textRight: Mmn...I didn't go inside their house,@and it's kind of an emergency...
Besides, you're on their property too,@so we're both guilty...
Anyways, Iroha and the rest should@be safe...right?

group_1.textLeft: You're asking that agaiiin~...?

group_1.textRight: This is important.

group_1.textLeft: Mm~... Pretty sure they're not deaaad~...

group_1.textRight: Really...?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, they're just inside my pillooow...
Maybe they'll come out soon enouuugh~...?

group_1.textRight: Why're you being so vague about this...!@That's your weapon, Hotaru, that pillow!

group_1.textLeft: 'Cauuuse... I don't really knooow~...
I used to be able to see insiiide...@But it's not opening its mouth anymore...
Ah...that reminds me, Akari - have I never@shown you it befooore~...?
It's pretty coool~... Inside of my pillooow...
It's got the perfect look for havin' a pajama@party; the space even expands ouuut~...!

group_1.textRight: I don't care about that.
If you could see inside it before, then@pry the thing's mouth open!

group_1.textLeft: Didn't I say I caaan't...?

group_1.textRight: Then keep trying until it opens!
In the meantime, I'll have to go explain@the situation to Ui.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...you're going to wake her uuup...@Poor girl...

group_1.textRight: And whose fault is that...?

group_1.textLeft: .....[wait:0.8][chara:304800:cheek_0][chara:404800:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:304800:lipSynch_1]Mine?

group_1.textRight: Since you understand, get that pillow@opened up.

group_1.textLeft: 'Kaaay~...
